alert.note: Alert for Bryan; Chatham (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 26 at 3:56PM EDT until April 26 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF BRYAN AND CHATHAM COUNTIES... At 356 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near I-16/I-95 Interchange, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Pooler, Richmond Hill, I-16/I-95 Interchange, Hunter Army Airfield, Windsor Forest, Midtown Savannah, Downtown Savannah, Garden City, Bloomingdale, and Burroughs. This warning includes the following interstates: I-16 between mile markers 151 and 162. I-516 near mile marker 3. I-95 in Georgia between mile markers 88 and 102. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
